Built on the best open source technology: Pošto je izgradjen na najboljoj tehnologiji otvorenog koda, elementary je platforma izuzetno naklonjena programerima. Postojećim i budućim programerima pružamo najbolje raspoložive resurse i dokumentaciju kako bi se osiguralo da vaše aplikacije zaista sjaje.
Read the Human Interface Guidelines (HIG: Read the Human Interface Guidelines (HIG) and learn how to make your app a first-class experience.
Learn about our Application Programming: Learn about our Application Programming Interface (APIs), and discover all the built-in technologies available to you.
Use Launchpad to manage bug reports and: Koristi Launchpad da rukovodiš izveštajima o bagovima i sarađuješ sa drugim programerima.
Set up an Ubuntu My Apps account and pub: Set up an Ubuntu My Apps account and publish your apps into the Software Center.
